channel.title: Client and server help
channel.description: i can't figure this out how to start up the server

item.title: Client and server help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Have you ever wondered why you hardly get help on these forums?
I’ve seen you post a few times… And no one really responded.
Well, I have an answer. It’s your thread. “please can anyone help me!” is a really, really bad title for the section. I personally know people that will skip your thread simply because of it.

If you would like more quality help, please look at the thread linked in my signature below, it has posting tips that I believe can help you give us better information, so we can give you the help you so badly want.

Read full topic
